text: Ocotea clarkei is a species of Ocotea in the plant family Lauraceae. It is an evergreen tree that is endemic to the Mexican state of Chiapas.González- Espinosa, M. 1998. Ocotea clarkei. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==References== clarkei Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Chiapas Category:Trees of Chiapas Category:Conservation dependent plants Category:Near threatened biota of Mexico Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
